teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Yun Xian. I am a Chinese native speaker and a Chinese language teacher with more than 18 years teaching experience after I majored Chinese language and literature in the university. I am qualified with teaching position by Ministry of Education of China with a teacher's qualification license since 2003. I hold a Spoken Chinese Proficiency Certificate from State Language Commission, which is an approval that I speak standard Mandarin without regional accent. Furthermore I speak English fluently, and I speak some German as well.  I don't take too much work or too many students at the same time,  so I have sufficient time to look after the learning of each of my students well.

Hi!  I am Sylvia Zhang. A Chinese teacher from Guangdong, China. I have taught Chinese for more than five years.  When I was studying at university, I started to teach online and help our foreign teacher to learn Chinese. I got extensive experience teaching kids and adults, one-on-one classes and group classes. Especially for teaching beginners！
With a bachelor's degree in teaching Chinese as a foreign language, I could professionally design the Chinese lesson for you. You can study basic Chinese, oral Chinese, HSK preparation or Chinese culture in my class. It is up to you! So welcome to my Chinese class! Let’s start the journey of learning Chinese.

Discount! Come and make an appointment for the try lesson！

☆Teacher Xinxin, from Dalian, China.
☆Practicing certificate for teachers of Chinese as an international language.
☆The certificate of putonghua grade II a. Graduated from Renmin University of China, majoring in Chinese language and literature.

新师优惠中！快来预约试听课吧！

☆鑫鑫老师~中国，大连人。
☆国际汉语教师执业证书。
☆普通话二级甲等证书。中国人民大学，汉语言文学专业毕业。

Hi,I'm Ada,you can also call me Ting.I'm a native speaker,and I come from WuHan ,Hubei Province ,China.I major in chinese as a foreign language,Meanwhile,I'm learning other language,so I can understand your difficulities and need of learning a new language.I love traveling and handwork , I'd like to share with you the chinese culture and beautiful scenery .I also like new things,I belive you will be my teacher to discover the new world,and I will also be your good helper to learn.

Hi! I am a native speaker from the northeast of China. I can speak standard Mandarin. My lessons all focus on speaking, and I teach grammar in the context of oral communication. Come improve your spoken Chinese with me! YOU ARE THE BEST IN THE WORLD!
My name is Angela. I am a native Chinese, working and living in Beijing now. I hold the certiifcate of Chinese teacher for speakers of other languages, and spend part of time as Mandarin teacher,

【ABOUT ME】
☑Native Chinese speaker with standard pronunciation
☑3-4 years teaching experiences.
☑A professional Chinese teacher with the Bachelor’s degree in Teaching Chinese as a foreign language
☑Qualification Certificate For Senior High School Chinese Teacher & Standard Chinese Proficiency Test certificate.
☑ Patient,fridenly,passional.

I'm EVA. I’m a Chinese native speaker from China. I can speak Mandarin and Cantonese.I majored in ENGLISH in my college as well. I totally understand your difficulties and thinking patterns. I focus on building CONFIDENCE and ENJOYMENT of Chinese language. 

IF you'r a beginner, I offer different textbooks (learn from easy to difficult). IF you're learnt some words and expression and you want to know more vocabulary and sentence, I have 100 different topics for you to practice. IF you can handle any topics, we can have free talk to improve your speaking and listening. 

If you want to HAVE A FUN LESSON,  Welcome to my class！！

Hello, ni hao! I am Anny. I majored in Chinese international education in Southwest University of China. After graduated, I worked as a Chinese teacher in Mandarin Garden, Shanghai. I have more than 3 years of online and offline Chinese teaching experience at school and over 1300 hours of teaching  on italki, all of which have given me confidence to work with students at different levels and to help them improve Chinese  effectively.

Thanks for checking my profile. I'm 施秋娴(Shī Qiūxián) from Guangdong, China. Feel free to call me Chill. I'm glad to be here and meet you guys. My major was Chinese language and Literature, and I passed Mandarin Proficiency Test with excellent score. Also I've been teaching foreigners for two years. I'm sure that I'm able to help you master Chinese. To me, teaching Chinese is not just a job, it also helps me make more friends. And I enjoying reading and doing Chinese calligraphy in my leisure time.

大家好，我是施秋娴，也可以叫我秋。我平常喜欢看看书，练练毛笔字。很高兴在这里跟大家见面，希望通过italki这个平台来帮助大家学习汉语，要是能跟大家交上朋友就再好不过了！

If you wish to book a class with me please make sure to use Italki Classroom, it's a very stable platform.

【About měi xuān】

✨A certificated, professional, experienced Chinese teacher, and freelance writer. 
✨Master of Arts Degree.
✨Speak standard Mandarin and fluent English to teach.
✨Studied and worked in mainland China, Hong Kong, Japan and Europe, perfectly cable of communicating and understanding interculturally.

【About měi xuān’s Chinese Class】

✨Ultimate aim-to COMMUNICATE and UNDERSTAND like a Chinese native speaker
✨Key to success-METHOD and PERSEVERANCE 

►For METHOD
Efficient, and full of fun. You can choose from structured and customized classes provided in different levels to meet various personalized needs. 

►For PERSEVERANCE
měi xuān will accompany you to get amazing results❗

我是中国人，现在在英国读研究生。我性格开朗，幽默，很好相处。因为高中的时候读的文科，我对于中国的历史、文学和哲学有一定的了解，很高兴跟大家探讨这些。另外，我喜欢烹饪，很乐意线上教大家做中国菜。我对于西方艺术和历史很感兴趣，当时大学毕业论文写的内容是关于波普艺术。最后，我喜欢跟不同文化背景的人交谈，我很乐意帮助大家在学习汉语的同时了解中国文化
I am Chinese and now studying in the UK for master degree. Other people think I am humorous and easy to get along with. As an art student, I know Chinese history, literature, and philosophy quite well, and I am happy to discuss these with you. In addition, I am quite into cooking and glad to teach you how to cook Chinese food. What's more, Western art and history are my type. I used to study pop art in my dissertation. Anyway it's my honor to help you understand Chinese culture.

Hi, my name is Crystal. I come from Malaysia and I stay in Penang. I have graduated from National University of Malaysia with a Bachelor Degree in Oleochemistry. I love to travel and learn different languages. I am a native speaker of Mandarin (Chinese), and i have learnt Malay and English since I was a kid. I am a friendly and responsible teacher. 

I have experienced teaching online Mandarin since year 2019. I have taught students from all ages, varies from kids to adults. I have experienced teaching in kindergarten and daycare center.

Every person has his own learning purpose, I will customize the lesson based on your requirements and your learning objective.

＊MBA & 6+years teaching experience
＊Teacher qualification for the level of Lecturer International Mandarin Chinese Promotion Institute
＊7000+sessions taught in China & UK
＊Special focus on SPOKEN CHINESE

Please contact me if you would like to book a slot that is not opened! 

This is Science Cody here and I would love to talk about how and why I can help you with Mandarin or English or even Science!

I'm passionate about football, and this has inspired me stepping onto the path of medical field. I am currently at the preparation stage, so I would call myself as a pre-medic student! 

I live in Scotland. Having the experience of studying and living in different countries, I have had to overcome language barriers and such. 

Being bilingual, I have multiple work experiences, as a translator, language tutor and such.

I love football, gym, we will have a lot to talk about! See you soon:)

Hello, I'm Isabell! (sorry to my old students that from 9th~15th, Feb. I‘m not available)

I am a certified teacher of Mandarin who's devoted to helping you achieve your Chinese language learning goals!

✔ Qualified teacher of TCSOL (Teachers of Chinese to Speakers of Other Language)
✔ Offering tailored classes 
✔ Using various teaching methods 
✔ Creating & finding new materials all the time 
✔ Adapting to learners of all ages and proficiencies
✔ Supporter of the notion of ''Teaching in the target language'' 
✔ 100％ patient and passionate about teaching  
✔ Also a language learner

안녕하세요.여러분. 나는 이사벨습니다. 나는 너의 중국어를 돕고 싶다. 질문이 있으면 언제든지 연락하십시오.

Hello, I'm June solstice. 
A native mandarin speaker who was born & grew up in China, but living in here Japan total 18 years now.  
I do speak Mandarin-Chinese, Japanese, Korean fluently as you can see and know from my profile video. 

I do love good food, nice conversation with interesting people. 
Good books with a cup of flavorful coffee or Jasmine-tea makes me calm and happy. 
Sometimes I do calligraphy in my alone time, it's really good for relax and concentrate.

Hi there, my name is Yen. I am a CELTA-certified English teacher and also have a certificate in teaching Mandarin Chinese as a second language. I taught English at a couple of language schools in Montreal, Canada and also worked as an IELTS invigilator there. Before that, I had worked in different countries including the United Kingdom, Sri Lanka, and Taiwan. If you are learning a language in order to be able to work or study abroad, you have found the right person to prepare you for the journey :)

2019 update: Teaching Mandarin Chinese at Lungwha University of Science and Technology as a lecturer, also giving IELTS prep lessons at language schools in Taipei, Taiwan.

Hi, I am Chloe. I come from China.
I am currently working in the field of education in Italy. Language is my most important learning object and working content.
I obtained the master degree in MTCSOL(Master of Teaching Chinese to the Speakers of Other Language). 
I have Certificate for International Chinese Language Teacher.
你好！我是Mariana.来自四川省，目前是一名研究生，我的专业是汉语国际教育，我有非常扎实的汉语基础知识，我在老挝担任过两年汉语老师，教授过小学生和中学生，也辅导过HSK的学生，因此对学生的需求是比较了解的，我是一个有耐心，有责任心的老师，此外，我喜欢旅游，听音乐，烹饪的等，如果大家有感兴趣的汉语话题，欢迎和大家讨论！
